revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Sagemcom |model=F@ST 5280 |revision=(RAC2V1S) |series=AC2900 |asin= |fcc_date=09/26/2017 |manuf_country=China |availability=Spectrum customers only |is_manuf=No |manuf= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=VW3FAST5280 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4906 |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model= |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646E-BYK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4366E |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4365E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, DFS (master), |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''1900''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan., 256QAM), :• '''750''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 1024QAM) = '''''2650 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC2650 Wave 2 Dual-Band WiFi Router}} "FAST5280CH/MB REV:1.03A" is silkscreened on the main board. :Also known as ''[[Sagemcom RAC2V1S]]''. The user manual is branded for ''Spectrum Cable''. A daughterboard with both Wi-Fi radios connects to the main board using a PCIe x1 slot. :This daughterboard has "FAST5280CH/WIFI REV:1.04" silkscreened on it. An FCC filing available 09/19/2017 was requested to be dismissed. :A new filing was available on 09/26/2017. ===Links=== *[http://www.dslreports.com/hardware/Sagemcom-RAC2V1S-h4676 ''Sagemcom RAC2V1S'' on '''DSL Reports'''] *[http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r32027383-HSI-Charter-RAC2V1S-Router-How-to-use-expert-mode ''Sagemcom RAC2V1S'' on '''DSL Reports''' forums] ===See also=== *[[Arris RAC2V1A]] - [[Arris TR4400-AC]] ([[SerComm]]) *[[Askey RAC2V1K]] - [[Askey RT4230W]] ([[Askey]]) *[[Sagemcom RAC2V1S]] - [[Sagemcom F@ST 5280]] *[[Ubee RAC2V1U]] - [[Foxconn]] U10H128.00 (Spectrum) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/XCNRAC2V1U XCNRAC2V1U] (2017-06-29) • DVE 12V/2.5A *[[Charter RAX1V1K]] - [[Askey RT5000W]] - 802.11ax DBDC Router *[[Askey RT4220W]] • ''Cube Router'' - 802.11ac 2x2 Router • [http://www.askey.com.tw/wireless10.html PPage] *[[Askey RT4230W]] • ''Puma Router'' - 802.11ac 4x4 Router • [http://www.askey.com.tw/wireless_RT4230W.html PPage] __NOTOC__
